body:
Comment 2 by **jon.forums**: 
Uh oh, building with my ancient mingw.org gcc 4.6.2 passes. Don't know if it's simple
header file difference with mingw-w64 or something else.

C:\Apps\go-hg\src>gcc --version
gcc (GCC) 4.6.2

...

# ..\misc\cgo\stdio

# ..\misc\cgo\test
ok      _/C_/Apps/go-hg/misc/cgo/test   1.189s

...

ALL TESTS PASSED

---
Installed Go for windows/386 in C:\Apps\go-hg
Installed commands in C:\Apps\go-hg\bin
